Text: You don't get enough thankyou's Raymond_U. So from me - Big thanks.

Thankyou Raymond,

It's extremely sad for Dan's family and Motorsport in general and I thank you for providing Autosport which is my link to celebrate Dan's Life. Many Thanks. Rick

Cheers Spankypoo, F110.

Rick - yes indeed. And so sad to lose Simoncelli now too. This is a dark time for motorsport.
